title: The Picture Frame Hack That Lets You Enjoy New Artwork in Seconds
description: I’ve had my eyes on changeable frames like this for a while now. I figure they would make it easier to show off my son’s ever-growing collection of artwork, but a lot of the ones I’ve seen get pricey. That’s why I love this hack from Debbie (@debstari) which highlights the popular IKEA FISKBO frames. It seems like I’m not the only one. title: What IKEA’s Top 3 Most-Searched Items Tell Us About 2025 (And The Hacks We Swear By)
description: Getting organized makes the shortlist when it comes to New Year’s resolutions, and one look at the top IKEA product searches in 2024 proves it. The three most-searched items all have one big thing in common and that’s storage. It makes sense since consumers today desire functional, calm, and aesthetically pleasing homes more than ever. According to the IKEA Life at Home Report 2023, 40% of people feel most at peace when their homes are organized.
